data.name: pattern_EditMessage
data.value:
h1.讨论编辑: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" 编辑了讨论:
$AdditionalData.get_item("MessagePreview")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
"了解更多":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
您的网站地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"编辑订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_LateMilestone
data.value: h1.逾期的里程碑通知: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID" 项目里程碑 ["$ProjectTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID"] is overdue: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID" . 您的网站地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" "编辑订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_MilestoneDeadline
data.value:
h1.里程碑截止日期通知: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
距离项目里程碑截止日期剩下不到48小时 ["$ProjectTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID"].
您的网站地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"编辑订阅地址":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_ProjectAcceptRequest
data.value:
h1.请求确认.
